name: Little Witch's Clinic
description:
Play as a witch desperately trying to cure her sick pigs. Run around, collect ingredients, brew potions and attempt to cure the pigs before it's too late!

Make sure to brew the right ingredients or the pigs might feel worse than before!

Made as part of a  class 3 week game jam at our college.

Programmer & VFX - Shadoz

3D Artists - Fippler & Coopah

2D Artists - Everyone
